Comment: Error strings should not be capitalized (unless beginning with proper nouns or acronyms) or end with punctuation, since they are usually printed following other context.
Snippet:
fmt.Errorf("something bad.")
  fmt.Errorf("this is okay")
  fmt.Errorf("This is not okay")
}
